summary: In a totalitarian future society, Winston Smith, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.
cast: Edmond O'Brien|Michael Redgrave|Jan Sterling|David Kossoff|Mervyn Johns|Donald Pleasence|Carol Wolveridge|Ernest Clark|Patrick Allen|Ronan O'Casey|Michael Ripper|Ewen Solon|Kenneth Griffith|Barbara Cavan|Walter Gotell|Anthony Jacobs|Barbara Keogh|Bernard Rebel|Patrick Troughton|John Vernon|Vivienne Villiers
